attributes.action: SACK POLICE OFFIERS CONVICTED OF VIOLENT CRIMES
attributes.additional_details:
We call for the dismissal of all police officers who have been convicted of a criminal offence
involving violence of any kind.

It is unacceptable that police offiers convicted of a crime such as domestic violence or assault can keep their Job if their Local Force so decides .There needs  to be a  policy ensrined in law requireing dismissal in all such cases
